verses.verse: Now when <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6419>praying,<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifices;<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> because the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

All the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> <S%H784>on,<s%> when the fire came <S%H3381>down,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was on the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and they <S%H3766>bowed<s%> themselves with their <S%H639>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> on the <S%H7531>pavement,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped,<s%> and gave <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2896>saying,<s%> "For he is good; for his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>"
Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep.<s%> So the <S%H4428>king<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5975>stood,<s%> according to their <S%H4931>positions;<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> also with <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3034>praised<s%> by their <S%H3027>ministry,<s%> <S%H2617>saying<s%> "For his loving kindness endures for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>" The <S%H3548>priests<s%> sounded <S%H2690>trumpets<s%> before <S%H3478>them;<s%> and all Israel <S%H5975>stood.<s%>

Moreover <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> made the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H6942>holy<s%> that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> for there he <S%H6213>offered<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> because the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H6213>made<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3557>receive<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat.<s%>

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>held<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3966>him,<s%> a very <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> from the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

On the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H6213>held<s%> a solemn <S%H6116>assembly:<s%> for they <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

On the <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%> to their <S%H168>tents,<s%> <S%H2896>joyful<s%> and <S%H8056>glad<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%> for the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6213>shown<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Thus <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house:<s%> and he successfully <S%H6743>completed<s%> all that <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8085>him,<s%> "I have heard your <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> and have <S%H977>chosen<s%> this <S%H4725>place<s%> to myself for a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2077>sacrifice.<s%>

<S%H2005>"If<s%> I shut <S%H6113>up<s%> the <S%H8064>sky<s%> so that there is no <S%H4306>rain,<s%> or if I <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H2284>locust<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> or if I <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> among my <S%H5971>people;<s%>

if my <S%H5971>people,<s%> who are <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> shall <S%H3665>humble<s%> <S%H6419>themselves,<s%> and pray, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>ways;<s%> then will I <S%H8085>hear<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and will <S%H5545>forgive<s%> their <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and will <S%H7495>heal<s%> their <S%H776>land.<s%>
Now my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be <S%H6605>open,<s%> and my <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H7183>attentive,<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> that is made in this <S%H4725>place.<s%>

For now have I <S%H977>chosen<s%> and made this <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6942>holy,<s%> that my <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H5704>there<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> and my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be there <S%H3117>perpetually.<s%>

"As for <S%H3212>you,<s%> if you will walk <S%H6440>before<s%> me as <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3212>walked,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8104>you,<s%> and will keep my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>ordinances;<s%>

then I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of your <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> according as I <S%H3772>covenanted<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3772><s%> 'There shall not fail you a <S%H376>man<s%> to be <S%H4910>ruler<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'

But if you turn <S%H7725>away,<s%> and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1980>you,<s%> and shall go and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and worship <S%H7812>them;<s%>

then I will pluck them up by the <S%H5428>roots<s%> out of my <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H1004>them;<s%> and this house, which I have made <S%H6942>holy<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> I will cast <S%H7993>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> it a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword<s%> among all <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

This <S%H1004>house,<s%> which is so <S%H5945>high,<s%> everyone who <S%H5674>passes<s%> by it shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Why has Yahweh <S%H6213>done<s%> thus to this <S%H776>land,<s%> and to this <S%H1004>house?<s%>'

They shall <S%H559>answer,<s%> <S%H5800><s%> 'Because they abandoned <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> who brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H2388>took<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H5647>them,<s%> and served <S%H935>them.<s%> Therefore he has brought all this evil on <S%H7451>them.<s%>'"
